title: MRC IEU software metrics
text:
Raw download count of MRC IEU authored and co-authored R packages on CRAN



Show the code
library(packageRank)

plot(
  cranDownloads(
    packages = c(
      "OneSampleMR",
      "ieugwasr",
      "epigraphdb",
      "tmsens",
      "mrbayes",
      "bpbounds",
      "Statamarkdown"
    ),
    from = "2018",
    to = Sys.Date() - 1
  ),
  statistic = "cumulative",
  multi.plot = TRUE,
  points = FALSE
)










Comparison with non-IEU MendelianRandomization package



Show the code
plot(
  cranDownloads(
    packages = c(
      "MendelianRandomization",
      "ieugwasr"
    ),
    from = "2016-08-31",
    to = Sys.Date() - 1
  ),
  statistic = "cumulative",
  multi.plot = TRUE,
  points = FALSE
)
